name: I Love My Little Girl
description:
Play with the baby of your dreams!

Hair, face, clothes... Choose the baby of your dreams and discover lots of ways to look after her the way you want: preparing meals, dressing up in different outfits, bathing, playing, going for walks…

  • Unlock new, even more adorable outfits for your toddler.
  • Cute and colourful graphics with 3D babies
  • Your baby laughs and cries just like a real one!
